content: I say v3 specifically because of things like this: https://gitlab.archlinux.org/archlinux/rfcs/-/merge_requests/2/diffs

https://llvm.org/docs/LangRef.html#llvm-masked-gather-intrinsics I know that LLVM, if it sees a consecutive gather, may choose to opt it into a simple load on some arches. I wonder if it does the same for swizzles if you store and then immediately gather?
no, it doesn't optimize a store/gather into a swizzle: https://llvm.godbolt.org/z/PrdTWz8bP
but glad to have the confirmation thank you~
